title: Why is Bluetooth buggy on my Pixel 4?
content:
Two main issues:

Whenever I'm playing music through Bluetooth, and then disconnect the Bluetooth device, the music continues playing. Even when I have paused Spotify and cleared all of my apps, I have to restart my phone to get it to stop.

As well as this, the Bluetooth notification says it is connected/on even when I've turned it off, tapping it replays the 'turning off' animation and it finally turns off.
